title: Learn how to build an e-Commerce App!
description:
Are you building an e-Commerce platform for your enterprise? Let us show you why you should build it on Astra DB. We will take you on a journey with one session per month and teach you how to design high-performing Cassandra data models to provide the best user experience for your customers. We will break down and step through common retail use cases and solutions, with each session building on the lessons learned from the last. In this session we will focus on implementing models and services for a shopping cart. Come join us and learn how to build top-notch E-tail data services!
Session details:
How to design high performance Cassandra data models
Focus on implementing models and services for a shopping cart.
